titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Yorke before the right Honorable, Henrie Earle of Huntington, Lorde President of her Maiesties councell established in the north, and other noble men, and gentle men, at a general communion there, the 23. of September in the eightienth yeare of her Maiesties raigne: by Mathewe Hutton Deane of Yorke.
titleStmt.author: Hutton, Matthew, 1529-1606.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
